title.rendered: Discovering and Fixing Dependency Vulnerabilities for Kubernetes apps with Snyk and Codefresh

content.rendered:
Don’t wait for production to catch vulnerabilities! 83% of organizations use vulnerable dependencies. By bringing Snyk into the CI/CD process we can scan Docker images as they are created and reveal vulnerabilities and fixes to developers as they work.

In this Codefresh Live event, we use Codefresh to integrate with Snyk for a secure continuous delivery pipeline. Watch it below:

Watch CODEFRESH LIVE

See the GitHub repo for the demo here so you can replicate it for yourself!

You can also view the slide deck below:

Discovering and Fixing Dependency Vulnerabilities for Kubernetes apps with Snyk and Codefresh from Codefresh

 

New to Codefresh? Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today (120 builds/month Free)!
